text: @tim_holt_wilson @NorwichCC @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency Thank you Tim for your post. Matt will be looking at the problem onsite this week & if you would like to chat with him about it, please contact him via our website. Thank you once again for making us aware of this issue.

@LKickers @EnvAgencySE @TMBC_Kent Well done boys. That is awful, but you’re making a difference with every piece of litter you collect. Keep it up, and hopefully more people will get involved and start to collect litter. That’s happening where I live. Better still, people might stop throwing it away!

urls.title: Case report: £505k in fines and costs following pollution at
urls.description: On Friday 3 February 2017, Suez Recycling and Recovery UK Limited (previously trading as SITA UK Limited) was ordered to pay £505,000 by Truro Crown Court following a series of offences at the Connon Bridge landfill site, near Liskeard. After pleading guilty, Suez was fined £180,000 for six offences under the Environmental Permitting (England and Wales) Regulations 2010. These
